credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 94 x 33.5 cm (37 x 13 3/16 in.)
title: Char du Soleil
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound weave with discontinuous supplementary weft (brocading)
description: A small two-wheeled chariot filled with flowers, drawn by a white horse across clouds and the bursting rays of the sun. A white scroll trails behind the chariot, serving as a base for a tent and a cluster of flowers. Brocaded in white, blue, green, pink, and brown on a turquoise ground. This unit is repeated in offset horizontal rows, alternating direction.
name: Textile
